+ Daniel Carter

  • Publications
  • CV
  • dcarter@txstate.edu
  • @danielwcarter

I’m an assistant professor of digital media in the School of Journalism and Mass Communication at Texas State University. I study social media data and algorithms, platform monetization and infrastructures.

Academic publications in: Environment and Planning D: Society and Space, Big Data and Society, Social Media + Society, First Monday, ACM Proceedings on Human-Computer Interaction, Design of Communication and Designing Interactive Systems, Journal of Documentation and Journal of the Association for Information Science and Technology.

Sometimes I make web things like a digital edition of Gertrude Stein’s Tender Buttons and a generative grammar that tries to get you to buy islands.
